verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of 'elohim <S%H430><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to the YY <S%H113><s%> of lords <S%H113><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him who alone doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him that by wisdom <S%H8394><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him that stretched out <S%H7554><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> above the waters <S%H4325><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him that made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights <S%H216><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
The sun <S%H8121><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
The moon <S%H3394><s%> and stars <S%H3556><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him that smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in their firstborn <S%H1060><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> them: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
With a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him which divided <S%H1504><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> into parts <S%H1506><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And made Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
But overthrew <S%H5287><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his host <S%H2428><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him which led <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
To him which smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> famous <S%H117><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
Sichon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for an heritage <S%H5159><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
Havahn an heritage <S%H5159><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Who remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us in our low estate <S%H8216><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And hath redeemed <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us from our enemies <S%H6862><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Who giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to all flesh <S%H1320><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>: for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
